1.content:
Cartoon Tickle Prison is full of the most ticklish cartoon stars ever seen. You take the roll of a tickle warden that has to tickle the cartoon stars.

You are armed with a feather duster, claw gloves, various brushes and an assortment of oils, lotions and powders.

There are 4 sections to the prison.

Section one: the cells.
Prisoners are not usually tickled in this section

Section two: punishment rooms.
Prisoners are tickled here daily

Section three: Cortyard/Tickle Stocks
When a prisoner is placed inside the stocks they get their feet licked by goats. Most prisoners fear this section

Section four: Wash Station.
The prisoners are restrained, washed and baby oil

Who are the prisoners?.

12.title: Buster Baxter (from aurther)

choices: To Have One Of His Daily Tickle Sessions

121.content:
Buster had stolen a Cyber Toy and had been sentenced to 2 months in the Cartoon Tickle Prison.

This meant he had to go to and from school in a big prison bus that said "Cartoon Tickle Prison" on the side of it, which added to his punishment as everyone at school laughed at him and instead of regular detention, he was tickled as per an agreement between the school and the prison.

He also had to submit to tickle sessions carried out by either guards, prisoners or visitors (warden's choice) three times a day. Once in the morning, Once in the afternoon or when he got back from school, and once before bed.

That means he had 3 sessions in one day (not counting any detention or punishment sessions for breaking rules while incarcerated)

He was allowed visitors, but he had to earn them by doing chores.

There was also a program he had to partake in, in which he was forced to go shirtless and barefoot at all times in the prison for the duration of his stay. He had only a pair of shorts to wear and was baby oiled on his sides, tummy, armpits and feet everyday, which also tickled horribly.

Poor Buster is so ticklish and dreads the 3 daily sessions, but don't take pity on him as these sessions are in place to teach him and other prisoners that stealing is wrong.

We join Buster as he's on his way...
121.title: That time he stole a Cyber Toy.

choices: Arthur and Binky talk to each other.
1211.content:
Buster was on his way to school in the cartoon tickle prison van.

He was sad, because he thought that his original punishment of being grounded and denied dessert was bad enough and he'd promised not to steal again, so this punishment felt redundant.

When he got dropped off at school, Francine, Muffy and the Tough Customers started laughing at him.
"Ha-ha!", said Binky, "What a loser? Whoever heard of a tickle prison?!"

There was one good thing, though: Arthur didn't laugh at him.
Arthur felt bad about the whole Cyber Toy incident too, and like Buster, he felt that being grounded and denied dessert was bad enough.
"Knock it off, Binky!" said Arthur, "he's not a loser!"

What happens now?
1211.title: To School

choices: The Prison (where Buster's friends Francine and Muffy are waiting for him)
The Prison (where the warden has a special torture waiting for him)
1212.content:
A miserable Buster trudged through the halls of Ellwood Elementary. The day was over, which was cause for celebration for everyone else, but for Buster it meant he'd have to take off his shirt and get on that stupid bus in front of everyone. And the driver would probably tickle him while they drove (very slowly) away while everyone watched and laughed.

And it'd be even worse when they got where they were going. The Prison didn't allow crowds who could point and laugh, but the things that could happen to him there made sure to take away any comfort he might have felt. Sometimes his mother or friends from school would be given "visiting rights" which was just a nice way of saying people he knew would be tickling him while they embarrassed him. Just yesterday he'd gone through a 5 hour visit with his Mom and Arthur's little sister DW. It still made him shudder just remembering their fingers while they laughed at him.

*Where in Buster's day should we go next?*
1212.title: To Have One Of His Daily Tickle Sessions

They were new were just being transported to the prison.

"Hi, guys," said Buster, I'm Buster Baxter. I'm here because I stole a Cyber Toy and they made me go shirtless and barefoot as part of my punishment. Who are you and why are you here?"

"I'm Tom", said the cat, "and this is Jerry. We're here because I tried to eat Jerry and then he dropped an anvil on my head. I've been reading up on this place. Deviating from the inmates' normal wardrobe is common for the people giving out punishments. We don't normally wear any clothes, so they made us wear all these clothes, but they will take them off to tickle us apparently."

121233.content:
"Noohohoho!" Buster screamed as he tried to run, but he was already starting to laugh and he fell in the dust as he tripped over his own feet and the squirmy little fingers wiggling into his hip bones.

DW had come up behind Buster while the Warden had him distracted. She'd been warned he'd probably try to run and this wasn't her first rodeo at the CTP. Her older brother Arthur had been sent here for a week after he'd hit her for accidentally breaking his model airplane. She'd been punished for breaking it in the first place after being asked not to touch it, but that had only been a "No TV" sentence. And who needed TV when she could have her big brother down to his underwear and laughing uncontrollably while she laughed at his reactions. The Warden thought it would educational for Arthur to have his little sister tickle him so that he'd always remember he couldn't just push her around. Now that he was home she couldn't just do whatever she wanted, but if she timed it right she could sneak in a few pokes to the tummy or scratches in the armpits and get away scott free.

That had been one of the best weeks of DW's life. Her Mommy had driven her up to the CTP every day after school where she'd meet Arthur getting off his bus and she could squeeze his sides or poke and scratch his bellybutton while the driver steered his squirms towards the Warden. Then the Warden would show her how to pat down prisoners before letting them into the prison proper. She'd join in of course and sometimes other kids from Arthur's school, or even her Mommy if she had the time, would come and help too. It got even better when she mentioned in passing to the Warden that her brother had a recurring embarrassing dream about ending up in his underwear in front of other people. After that the Warden would always find some excuse to take Arthur's pants and then the fun really got started.

The Warden seemed to really like DW and he, and the older girls when they were there, would show her the best ways to tickle and get the best reactions. Fern and Francine had taken it upon themselves to teach her how to play "count his ribs" while Muffy had shown her all the fun she could have with makeup brushes around his neck or nail polish wands at his feet. Her Mommy though, she knew just about everything about tickle talk. She left everything but one armpit free for everyone else to tickle while she cooed in her boys ear while he laughed and laughed.

Tickling and embarrassing her brother like that had been so much fun, especially when he'd gotten into trouble in school and they had called her in special to tickle him till he almost peed himself in front of the whole school. So when it was time for him to come home DW had been sad that her fun was (mostly) over. Then she'd heard that Buster had gotten himself sent to the CTP for steeling and it looked like she would be playing her new favorite game again. The Warden had apparently had the same thought as he'd called Buster's Mom special to see if she'd bring DW along for the first day of fun. Buster's Mom had shown DW all his best spots and just the particular way Buster and Arthur were different. After a while she'd gotten the hang of tickling him and together she and Buster's Mom had him laughing till he cried and blushing like crazy.

Now she had Buster all to herself and she was going to have so much fun with him...
121233.title: A Day With DW

12513.content:
Buster woke up in his cell.

He was shirtless and barefoot, and didn't know what to expect.

He was sentenced to the tickle prison for 3 months for stealing a fossilized dinosaur footprint from the museum.

He had been told yesterday that today would be when his punishment sessions started, but he hadn't been told exactly what the punishment was.

A guard came into buster's cell.

"Alright prisoner, on your feet" said the guard.

Buster did as he was told, and got out of bed onto his feet.

The floor was made of concrete, and was very cold under Buster's bare feet.

"Ooh, it's cold. Can I please have my socks back?" asked Buster.

"No. Footwear is forbiden in this prison. If you are found wearing footwear or possessing footwear, you will be subjected to our worst punishments and your sentence goes up another month" said the guard.

"Ok" said Buster.

"Alright, come with me" said the guard.

Buster was taken down a hallway and eventually came to two rooms.

"Ok prisoner. These are the preparation room, where we prepare you for punishments, and the punishment room, where you'll wish you'd never committed a crime" said the guard

Buster noticed there was frantic laughter from other prisoners in the punishment room.

"What's in the punishment room? Why are they laughing?" asked Buster.

"Don't worry prisoner, you'll find out soon enough" said the guard.

First, buster was taken into the preparation room.

Inside, there were lotions and oils everywhere, and a table in the middle of the room.

"Lie down on that table, and we'll get started" said the guard.

Buster did as he was told, and the guard walked up to him with a bottle of moisturizing lotion.

It was time to tickle a cartoon character out of their mind again.

I look at the sheet I was handed and see that I will be tickling Bart Simpson.

When I get to the tickle room he is restrained in a set of stocks with his toes tied back and his shirt off.

"Hey Bart" I say to him.

"Bite me, man" he retorts angrily.

"How about I tickle you instead?" I tease.

"You even touch me and I'll make you sorry" he yelled.

"How are you planning to do that? Don't forget Bart, you are trapped. I could tickle your feet all day and you couldn't do a thing to stop me" I tell him.

"Hey, get away from me" he says as I sit at his feet with a bottle of baby oil.

"Oh come now, stop being so difficult" I say as I rub the oil all over his trapped feet.

"NOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOO. NOT THE OIL. PLEEEEEHEHEHEEEASE" he howls.

"Uh oh. I think a certain TV bad boy has ticklish little feet. Does it tickle? Is it bad? This is only the oil, just wait till ya feel the brushes" I taunt.

Once I was done I grab 2 electric toothbrushes and switched them on.

"NOOOOOOOOOO. HAVE MERCY. I'M BEGGING YOU" he cries.

I get real close to his ear and say very softly "time to scream" before placing them on his soles.

"BWAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAA. NO MOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOORE. NOT THE FEET I'M BEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEGGING YOU. AAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAA I'M SOOOOOHOHOHOOORY" Bart screams.

"Too late. You did the crime...now DO THE TIME" I say as I put the vibrating bristles on his bare toes.

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAAAIT. DON'T TORTURE ME. I'LL BE GOOOOOOHOHOHOOOD. AAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAA. DUUUUUHUHUHUUUUDE IF YOU DON'T STOP I'M GONNA PEE MY PANTS" he screams.

"Let's test that theory shall we?" I say as I place the vibrating neck of the brush head between his big toe and other toe.

"NAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAA. GET EM OOOOOOHOHOHOOOUT OF THERE. I CAN'T STAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAAAAAND IT" Bart screams.

I decide to give Bart a break to catch his breath.

"Du...du...duuuuude. Never do that again. That was waaaaaay to intense" he cries.

"I can't promise never again but I CAN tell you it won't be ME tickling you after your break. I'm gonna sit back while someone else tickles you" I tell him.

The door opened and the new tickler came in. It was none other than...

1553333331.content:
Emily was here because she had been really moody lately and her parents thought she needed to laugh and smile a little.

When I entered her cell she tied to her bed. She was wearing a tank top and was barefoot, her feet, tummy and armpits just called out for a good long tickle session.

"Hey Emily. I'm here to make you smile" I said.

"Go away. I'm mad at my parents for bringing me here and I'm mad at the staff here for tying me up" she sulked.

"Oh don't you worry sweetie, pretty soon you won't be able to be mad" I told her as I gathered my tools.

"What are you gonna do huh? Tell me a funny joke? Show me a funny video on YouTube? Well it's not gonna work cos I'm not in the mood" she said inbetween grunts as she pulled at her binds.

I had my tools so I went over and stroked her hair. "Hush now. You're tiring yourself out and you need your energy for this" I told her.

"I already told you I'm not in the mood to smile so get lost" she snapped.

"Really? You won't smile? Not even if I do this" I asked as I spidered my fingers on her tummy.

"Huh? Ohhhh no. No fair. Qu...quit iht. That tickles" she giggled

"Time to get faster" I said as I sped my fingers up.

"Uuuuuuhuhuhuhuhuuuu. Nonono. Not that. Please just stohohop it. My tummy is ticklish" she giggled louder.

"Hehe. I can see that. Time for raspberries" I said as I got ready to blow a big wet raspberry on her tummy.

"NO PLEASE NOT THE RaaaaaaaaHaHaHaaaasBerrries. Nuuuuhuhuhuuu not another. HaaaaaaaaHaHaHaaaaaa. Pleheheeease. They sound funny like faaahahahaarts" she laughed.

"Time to tickle someplace else" I sang to her.

"Please just stop. I'll smile more I promise" she begged.

"Nope. I think it's high time I feathered these perfect pits" I said as I picked up 2 fluffy feathers.

"Not the feathers please" she giggled in ticklish anticipation.

"To late. tickle ickle ickle" I teased.

"NOOOOOOHOHOHOOOOOO. IT TICKLES. PLEEEHEHEEEASE GO BACK TO MY TUMMY. MY PITS ARE TOO SENSITIVE. THOSE FEATHERS ARE CRUEL IN MY TICKLISH PIIIIIHIHIHIIIITS" she howled.

Next I put the feathers down. "Time for a little game" I said.

"Round and round the garden, like a teddy bear" I sang as I circled her palms with my nails.

"NO PLEASE" she cried.

"One step" I said as I tickled her sides. "Oooooohohohooo. Please stop" she giggled.

"Two steps" I said as I spidered her ribs. "Waaaaaaaahahahaaa. No not there" she giggled louder.

"Aaaaaand...Tickly under there" I said as I spider tickled her armpits.

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAA" STOP PLEEEEEEHEHEHEEEEEEASE. THAT TICKLES SO MUUUUUHUHUHUUUCH" she squealed as she bucked and wiggled and bounced on her butt"

"See you're happier already. Let's move onto those cute feet of yours" I said.

"NOOOOOOOO. ANYTHING BUT MY FEET. I'M GONNA DIE IF YOU TICKLE ME THERE" she screamed.

"Too bad cos that's where I'm going to tickle I said as I started coating her soles and toes in baby oil.

"Heeeeeeheheheheeeee. You suuuuhuhuhuuuck. Ooohohohohooo it tickles so much" she giggled.

"Someone just looooooves getting tickled on her tender tootsies I think" I teased.

"Dooooohohohooo not" was the reply.

Once I was done I decided it was time to make her go crazy. I picked up 2 hairbrushes and used them on Emily's feet.

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA..........HAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAA. NOT THAT. OH PLEEEEEEEEEEEE...........HEHEHEHEHEEEEEASE NOT THE BRUSHES. MY FEET CAN'T HANDLE IT" she screamed inbetween silent laughter while wiggling her toes like crazy.

I again put my tools down and let her recover a little.

"Time for another game" I sang.

"UFF UFF UFF...NO MORE GAMES. PLEEEEASE" she begged.

"Oh nonsense. It'll be fun. This one's called This Little Piggy" I told her.

"NONONO. I HATE THAT GAME" she cried.

"Too bad. This little piggy goes to market" I sang as I tickled her big toe. "Nooooohohohooo" she giggled.

"This little piggy stays home" I sang as I tickled the next toe along. "Eeeeeheheheheheeee" she giggled

"This little piggy had roast beef" I sang as I tickled the middle toe. "Please no please no please nooooohohohooo" she giggled.

"This little piggy has none" I sang as I tickled the next toe. "Woooohohohohohooo no more" she giggled.

And this little piggy went..." I sang as I tickled the little toe. Please please please please pleeeease stohohooop. I hate this bit" she giggled.

"Wewewewewewe aaaaaaaall the way home" I sang as I spider tickled all over the feet.

"WAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAA. OH PLEEEEEEEHEHEHEEEEEASE STOP TICKLING. NOT THERE OH PLEEEEEEASE" she screamed

What happened next?

1553333333222223222331.content:
Vicky had been taken to the Cartoon Tickle Prison kicking and screaming.

She'd been arrested for being the nastiest, meanest babysitter who'd ever been hired, and had been given all night to calm down in her cell.

You entered to find Vicky sat on her bed, her bare feet on the cold stone floor.

"Vicky, you are a mean babysitter for the unfortunate children that get stuck with you for the night, a horrible big sister to Tootie, a nasty daughter for your parents and an all round terrible, evil and bratty human being...and everyone agrees that you need to be taught a lesson. That is why you're here, WE will reform you into a nice person" you explain to Vicky.

"And I'll reform your face into a BROKEN MESS" growled Vicky.

"I'm only going to warn you once, threats will result in punishment" you say sternly.

"Hah, you don't scare me. What're you gonna do? Extend my sentence? Bring it on, PUNK" laughed Vicky.

"Oh, trust me Vicky. You don't want to find out what the punishments are in this place" you tell her.

"And YOU don't wanna find out how badly I can CRUSH YOU" cried Vicky as she stood up and got ready to attack.

"GUARDS" you call.

Just then, two big guards came running into the cell.

"You think you're tough? BRING IT, LOSERS" cried Vicky as she ran at the guards.

The guards easily grabbed her and dragged her back to her bed kicking and screaming as before.

"LET ME GO. WHEN I GET FREE, YOU ARE GOING DOWN" screamed Vicky as the guards pinned her to the bed on her back and cuffed her wrists to the metal frame.

"Sure we are, whatever you say" laughed the guards as they cuffed her ankles to the bed frame next, making her spread eagle.

The guards walked out, leaving you with Vicky.

"Now do you see what happens?" You ask.

"WHEN I GET OUT OF THESE CUFFS, YOU...ARE...DEAD" snarled Vicky.

"Oh, but I haven't shown you the punishment yet. See, there's a reason besides humiliation and stoping escape attempts that all the prisoners here are barefoot just like you" you tell her as you take a seat by her feet.

"My feet? How are you gonna punish me by using my feet?" Asked Vicky.

"Observe" you say as you stroked a single finger up each bare foot.

"Huh? S..stop. That t...tickles. EEK. UuuuuUUUUUH. Is that the b...b...best you can do?" asked Vicky.

"No, this is" you tell her before using all 10 fingers.

"AAAAAAAAH. NO, NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOOOOOOOOOOO. YOUR DEEEEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAD, I SWEAR IT. NOT FAIR, NOT FAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAAIR" howled Vicky.

"Fair? Do you think it's fair when you pick on the kids you babysit, even though they're much younger than you? Do you think it's fair to brake all your little sister's toys? Is it fair that your parents live in fear of their own daughter every day? You wouldn't know fair if it came up and kicked you in the butt" you say.

"WOOHOOHOOHOOHOOHOOHOOHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAA. IT TICKLLLLLLLLLLLLES. STOP IT. NO, NOT MY TOES. PLEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEASE HAVE MERCY" screamed Vicky.

"And why should I? Would YOU have mercy if you were making a little kid cry? This is karma at its finest, now suffer" you say.

Eventually, you give Vicky a little break.

"Thanks...For...stopping" panted Vicky.

"It's not over yet, just a little break" you tell her.

"WHAT? PLEASE, I CAN'T TAKE ANY MORE" cried Vicky.

"Now you have an idea of how you make the kids you bully feel" you said.

"YOU CAN'T KEEP GOING, YOU CAAAAAAAN'T" begged Vicky.

"I won't be the tickler when the session continues" you tell her.

Just then someone knocks the door.

"That should be your new tickler now. Come on in, it's perfectly safe now she's cuffed to the bed" you say.

Vicky was surprised to see the person entering the door was...

Who entered the cell?

15533333332222232223333232.content:
When you arrived at work today, you were told you were assigned to interrogate a member of the Mobian Resistance.

You thought it would be Sonic but when you enter the cell you found a purple, female hedgehog instead.

She was cuffed to the bed by her wrists and ankles, but still had her boots on.

"State your name, prisoner" you instructed.

"Oh brother, you have got to be kidding me" the prisoner said.

"This is no joke. State your name" you tell her.

"I'm not telling you ANYTHING until I'm uncuffed" huffed the prisoner.

"I warn you, we have ways of making you tell us what we want to know. Just make it easy for everyone and tell us" you say.

"Try it, I'm trained to withstand ANY amount of torture" said the prisoner.

"Have it your way" you say as you begin unlacing her left boot.

"Huh? Wait, why are you taking my boots?" Asked the prisoner.

"OUR forms of torture require the victim to be barefoot" you say as you start unlacing the right boot.

"Why? What are you doing that my feet need to be bare for?" Asked the prisoner.

"You shall see in due time" you say.

Having unlaced the boots, you decide to remove them to reveal a pair of soft purple feet.

"I'm warning you. If you scuff those boots, you will not hear the end of it" huffed the prisoner.

"I ask you one last time before employing one of my torture methods, what is your name" you asked.

"Bite me" said the prisoner.

"Well, you've bought this on yourself" you tell her, before stroking her bare right foot slowly with one finger, then the left.

"Wh...what are you doOOOOOOING? C...cut it oUuuUT, it tickles" moaned the prisoner as her toes started wiggling.

"Exactly" you say as you use all 10 fingers at a much faster pace.

"HAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAA. STOP, PLEEEEEEEEEEHEHEHEHEHEEEEEEEASE. WOOHOOHOOHOOHOOHOOHOOHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAA. NO, NOT THE TOES. EYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA. SONIA. MY NAME...IS SONIAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAA. OOH, NO MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHOHOHOHOHOOOOOOOOOOOORE" screamed the prisoner.

"Nice to meet you, Sonia" you say.

"THAT...WAS HORRIFIC" panted Sonia.

"Well if you answer all of my questions properly, it won't happen again" you say.

Sonia was still trying to recover.

"So, I've been told that your a Resistance member from Mobius. You got captured by SWAT bots, and your brothers escaped. Now what I'm assigned to find out is, where are your brothers?" You asked.

"That's for me to know, and for you to never find out" said Sonia.

"Oh believe me Sonia, you DON'T wanna experience a second round of tickling. This time, I'll be using a feather" you say.

"You can torture me all day, but I still won't talk" said Sonia.

"Fine, I guess I'll just have to tickle it out of you" you say.

Sonia's toes began wiggling as you approached her feet.

"Last chance. If you tell me now, it'll save you a lot of laughter" you tell her.

Sonia decided to...
